thread.title: Asian Messaging Platforms Generate More Revenue Than U.S. Peers, Consultant Says
thread.title_full: Asian Messaging Platforms Generate More Revenue Than U.S. Peers, Consultant Says - WSJ

author: Yun-Hee Kim
title: Asian Messaging Platforms Generate More Revenue Than U.S. Peers, Consultant Says
text:
LAGUNA BEACH, Calif—When it comes to messaging, U.S.-based players like Facebook Inc.’s WhatsApp and Facebook Messenger have a few things to learn from their Asian counterparts, a technology consultant says.
Asian messaging platforms such as Tencent Holdings Ltd.’s WeChat, Kakao Corp.’s KakaoTalk and Naver Corp.’s Line generate more revenue from their services compared with their Western peers because they have successfully built... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
